name: GranniesGrumble
description:
Submission for the Wowie 3.0 Jam!!!! The theme was Failure is Progress.

Play as a peacemaker between three disgruntled and foul-mouthed island residents. Try as you might to unite them, whatever you do seems to anger them, but perhaps a common enemy is what they need to bring them together? Play the game and find out how to help them the best or worst.

Our interpretation of the theme is that you can seemingly fail to unify the community but that is what actually brings them together.

WARNING: explicit language and themes rated for 18+
Art and Level Design by Wilhelm Pfitz
Narrative, Development and Programming by Xavier Poole
Sound design, Voice edits and Music by Daniel Poole

Controls: WASD to control walking directional, SHIFT to sprint, ENTER to interact with the characters and the world and ESC to close the game.
